education_text.0: After pursuing undergraduate studies at      Massachusetts Institute of Technology MIT, Kiczales started his research career in 1980 at the      MIT Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence Laboratory MIT Lab for Computer Science, where he stayed until 1983After pursuing undergraduate studies at      Massachusetts Institute of Technology MIT, Kiczales started his research career in 1980 at the      MIT Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence Laboratory MIT Lab for Computer Science, where he stayed until 1983In 2000, he moved to      Canada and joined the      UBC Department of Computer Science Department of Computer Science at the      University of British Columbia University of British Columbia as a tenured professorIn 2002, he founded      Intentional Software Intentional Software with      Charles Simonyi Charles Simonyi, but then left the company in 2003 in order to return to      University of British Columbia UBCIn July 2017, he was appointed executive director of UBC Extended Learning
